articles.title: 'I'm coming home, baby!': Sean 'Diddy' Combs reacts after verdict read - ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
articles.source: ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
articles.summary: 'I'm coming home, baby! ': Sean 'Diddy' Combs reacts after verdict read Combs was acquitted of the most serious charges in the mixed verdict. ByTonya Simpson, Stephanie Maurice, Jared Kofsky, Peter Charalambous, and Meredith Deliso 'I'm coming home, baby! ': Sean 'Diddy' Combs reacts after verdict readThe jury found Sean Combs not guilty of racketeering conspiracy, the most serious charge.
